content.title: <RichColor Color="1,0.5,0,1">Welcome to Arktic</>
content.text:
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">We aim to stay true to the game with just slightly boosted rates, no excessive or game breaking mods, and no player or dino level alterations. We still want to feel the grind and work for the PVE progression.</>


<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">We hope you enjoy your stay here!</> <RichColor Color="1,0,0,0.8"><3</>

content.title: <RichColor Color="1,0.2,0,1">Server Rates:</>
content.text:
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Max Wild Dino Lvl: 150 / 180Tek</>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">x1 Night/Day Speed</>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">x3 XP</>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">x3 Taming/Harvesting/Gathering (x4 on Events)</>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">x5 Breeding/Mating (x6 on event)</>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">x5 Larger item stacks</>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Stacked prime meat/mutton/honey</>

content.title: <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Server Rules:</>
content.text:
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">o</> <RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Treat everyone with respect. We are all people trying to have fun.</>

<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">o</> <RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Behave in game - no griefing, spam, blocking of resources/obelisks or bases and no  inappropriate character names or names like human/123 etc.</>

<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">o</> <RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Traps must be unlocked for public use or picked up.</>

Consider supporting us as we aim to give the best possible gaming experience.


What are donations used for? 
Server hardware upgrades such as:
   o  RAM - Around 15GB per server. (upgraded to 128GB RAM out of pocket)
   o  Better Cooling (CPU Fan/Chassi Fans)
   o  Future upgrades/repairs
Possible network upgrades
Server Maintenance
   o  Network cost
   o  Electricity cost
+ Labor


Be Aware!
We no longer take donations to Nitrado since we are moving away from their services and will start self hosting. 
(no saves will be lost, don't worry).

Press <RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Donate</> below and follow the instructions.





Thank you for being a part of Arktic! 

Sincerely, 
Pizza
